name: Hand painted merino/silk combed top 50/50 #1b
description:
This wool top of 50/50 merino silk combed top, will make a gorgeous yarn with wonderful drape. The hand painted roving's colours are deep and rich with complete saturation. There are 8 oz dyed in the same package, check for the a and b. 

4 oz
merino 50%
cultivated silk 50%
hand wash cool and lay flat to dry
#1b
Though I do my best with photos, please be aware that monitors may show colours differently. Deep colours may bleed on first wash.

name: Hand painted merino/silk 50/50 combed top #2a
description:
This wool roving of 50 50 merino silk combed top, will make a gorgeous yarn with wonderful drape. The hand painted roving's colours are deep and rich with complete saturation. This is a stunning braid. There are 8 oz dyed in the same package, check for the a and b. 

4 oz
merino 50%
cultivated silk 50%
hand wash cool and lay flat to dry
#2a
Though I do my best with photos, please be aware that monitors may show colours differently. Deep colours may bleed on first wash.

name: WaterColour Braids: Hand Painted merino/silk #33a
description:
This wool top of 50/50 merino silk combed top, will make a gorgeous yarn with wonderful drape. The hand painted roving's colours are deep and rich with complete saturation. 

This braid is a Watercolour Braid which will spin up to be a rich semi solid yarn.
There are 8 oz dyed in the same package, check for the a and b. 

4 oz
merino 50%
cultivated silk 50%
hand wash cool and lay flat to dry
Though I do my best with photos, please be aware that monitors may show colours differently. Deep colours may bleed on first wash.

name: Hand Painted yak/silk 50/50 combed top #11a
description:
This combed top of yak and silk roving, will make a gorgeous, silky yarn. The hand painted colours are deep and rich with complete saturation. The top is NOT difficult to spin as long as you start out slow and put alot of twist in it. In no time you will have the hang of it and will be richly rewarded. Spindle folks...this is made for you. 

4 oz approx.
yak 50%
cultivated silk 50%
hand wash cool and lay flat to dry
#11a
Though I do my best with photos, please be aware that monitors may show colours differently.

name: WaterColour Braids: Hand Painted organic polworth/silk #17a
description:
Lovely bouncy organic polworth silk wool combed top that is 22 microns - as soft as merino and easier to spin ! The combination of polworth and tussah silk ( the silk is NOT organic) is such a delight to spin; soft and lofty.                                                                                                      This colourway is what I'm calling The WaterColour Braidsthe colours flow throughout the top and when spun will create a semi solid yarn, Remember to look for the a & b if you want 8 oz for a larger project. This is a truly lovely wool to spin. 

4 oz
75% organic polworth
25% bombyx silk
hand wash cool and lay flat to dry
#17a

Though I try my best with photos, please be aware that monitors often show colours differently. Strong colors may bleed on first wash.

75% organic polworth
25% bombyx silk
hand wash cool and lay flat to dry
#27a

Though I try my best with photos, please be aware that monitors often show colours differently. Strong colors may bleed on first wash

name: WaterColour Braids: Hand Painted organic polworth/silk #27b
description:
Lovely bouncy organic polworth silk wool combed top that is 22 microns - as soft as merino and easier to spin ! The combination of polworth and tussah silk ( the silk is NOT organic) is such a delight to spin; soft and lofty.                                                                                                      This colourway is what I'm calling The WaterColour Braidsthe colours flow throughout the top and when spun will create a semi solid yarn, Remember to look for the a & b if you want 8 oz for a larger project. This is a truly lovely wool to spin. 

4 oz
75% organic polworth
25% bombyx silk
hand wash cool and lay flat to dry
#27b

Though I try my best with photos, please be aware that monitors often show colours differently. Strong colors may bleed on first wash

name: Hand Painted Super Wash Corriedale/nylon fingering yarn #44
description:
This fingering weight yarn of SW Corriedale and Nylon is a sturdy sock yarn that is still comfortable and reasonably soft. It will also make great baby outerwear as well as lovely shawls, etc. 

430 yards
needle sizes 2-3 US
SuperWash Corriedale 90%
Nylon 10%
4ply

Turn inside out to machine wash and lay flat to dry
Though I try to to do my best with photos, please realize that different monitors will show colour differently.

name: Hand Painted BFL/SILK Combed Top #59a
description:
Handpainted wool roving of BFL (blue face leicester) / silk is a lovely versatile fiber that both the new spinner and the experienced spinner will delight in. This hand dyed roving is easy to spin and results in a strong yarn with a beautiful sheen. Remember to look for the a & b if you want 8 oz for a larger project. 

4 oz
75% bfl
25% tussah silk
hand wash and lay flat to dry


Though I try my best with photos, please be aware that monitors often show colours differently. Strong colours may bleed on first washing.

name: Hand Painted Sport Weight Cormo Wool Yarn #58
description:
Here we are with the most special of wools IMHO. This is a sport weight, worsted spun two ply yarn that I got from Elsa Wool's it's the best. It's incredibly soft as it has cormo lamb's wool mixed in with the adult cormo. I don't know how long I will have this as it's expensive and there is a limited supply, but it is WONDERFUL!

2 ply worsted spun sport weight
400 yds.
4-6 US

Hand wash cool and lay flat to dry
Though I try to to do my best with photos, please realize that different monitors will show colour differently.

name: Hand Painted Sport Weight Cormo Wool Yarn #69

name: Hand Painted Sport Weight Cormo Wool Yarn #70
description:
Here we are with the most special of wools IMHO. This is a sport weight, worsted spun two ply yarn that I got from Elsa Wool's it's the best. It's incredibly soft as it has cormo lamb's wool mixed in with the adult cormo. I don't know how long I will have this as it's expensive and there is a limited supply, but it is WONDERFUL!

2 ply worsted spun sport weight
400 yds.
3-6 needle US

Hand wash cool and lay flat to dry
Though I try to to do my best with photos, please realize that different monitors will show colour differently.

name: Hand Painted Shetland Combed Top #73b
description:
If you've never spun nice shetland, hand painted wool combed top, now is the time to try it. This is really nice shetland wool from the Shetland Isles, and though Shetland is not next to the skin soft, I do love it for it ease of spinning and sturdiness without being terribly scritchy. This will make wonderful socks, mittens, shawls, of course Faire Isle sweaters and good felting fibers. This is an overdye of natural brown wool and results in deep rich colors. 

4 oz 
shetland wool 
hand wash in cool water and lay flat to dry. 
please be aware that there may be some colour bleed on first wash 
Monitors may show colours differently
